title: DebateModAI
description: A modern SaaS platform for debate practice and skill development, featuring AI-powered feedback and real-time video debates.

title: A Maze-ing
description: Generates an interactive 3D maze for players to solve! Built on a Svelte frontend and Go backend, featuring authentication (OAuth), Threlte (Three.js wrapper), and CI/CD (CircleCI).

title: NameThatFish
description: Cross-platform fish identifier app using React Native, Flask, and TensorFlow. Fine-tuned EfficientNet CNN model on custom dataset to classify 20+ fish species.

title: ApeironDev
description: ApeironDev is a scalable and robust cloud-native web IDE providing secure, sandboxed code execution and AI-powered code assistance.

title: Bitboard Chess
description: A high-performance chess engine leveraging magic bitboards for fast move generation. Built with C++ and Docker, featuring OOP principles and various chess heuristics.

title: BlackJack Trainer
description: A CLI based Java program that helps players improve at the card game Blackjack.
